title: Add uploaded photo to the About section

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image file (IMG_20251223_133615~2-6.jpg) to the frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/uploads/, and update the About section image to use this new file so it renders in the About section on the home page.
acceptanceCriteria: The About section on the home page displays the new uploaded photo without broken-image icons in both desktop and mobile layouts.
The has an English alt attribute describing the image (no empty alt).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not add new pages, routes, or backend storage for images.
Do not implement image upload functionality; only add the already-uploaded file as a static asset and reference it.
